original_title: Roshan fires at Ranil & Co.; says life is at risk
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st): Sports Minister Roshan Ranasinghe says that his life is at risk, and if something were to happen to his life, the President, Sagala Ratnayake, and others should be held responsible.
He made this startling remark in a special statement to Parliament.
